org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.windowed

Interface RecordWindow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LambdaRecordWindow

    public interface RecordWindow
extends Serializable
    This Interface checks if a record window is opened for accumulation of records or if it is closed to drop all accumulated records and the current record.
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 16.08.2018

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<String> getChannelIdentifiers()
      Collects all identifiers of channels that are used in here.
      boolean inWindow(MRecord record)
      Checks if a processing window is open or closed.

    • Method Detail

      • inWindow

        boolean inWindow(MRecord record)
        Checks if a processing window is open or closed. In case of open -> all records will be accumulated in the next processing instance of the record. In case of closed -> all records and the current are dropped in the next processing instance of the record.
        Parameters:
        record - is checked if a window is open or closed
        Returns:
        true if window is open, false otherwise

      • getChannelIdentifiers

        Collection<String> getChannelIdentifiers()
        Collects all identifiers of channels that are used in here.
        Returns:
        a List or Collection of channel identifiers.
